channel.title: Jagex Ban bar will degree in time?
channel.description:
So i was done with botting masks, and decided to get back to 99 hunter.
So i started up the bot (Flawless Script super anti-ban), and 6 hours later i find myself looking at the login screen saying my account is disabled.
So i shitted my pants (cuz i have a 1270 total and i did prob 1200 myself, and i've got a nice bank because of the masks) and i went to the account status thing to check my ban.
[img]http://gyazo.com/5fa6fb8b0df0d50fd07845c8b1574a1c.png[/img]
So i was lucky it was just 1 day, but if i bot ever again i get perm banned. And my account is worth the me alot.
So thats why i'm checking if the ban meter will ever degree again so i can finish my 88/99 hunter. Aint feeling like doing that myself xd

item.title: Jagex Ban bar will degree in time?
item.dc:creator: @Porygon Porygon
item.description:
@Porygon wrote:

Tutorial:

Why don’t you stop botting and actually play the game then?

I agree.

Read full topic

I do care if they remove my 48m cash stack and 3 mask sets xD[/quote]
if they didnt give me those 3k chins i need to train range
for free

@gunz4life wrote:

So i shitted my pants (cuz i have a 1270 total and i did prob 1200 myself, [b]and i've got a nice bank because of the masks[/b]) and i went to the account status thing to check my ban.

I haven’t played runescape lately, but if I recall a while back, jagex used to remove botted items and lower your botted skills, assuming you were caught for either botting masks or hunter, wouldn’t one of 'em disappear?
